name: legal-ai
description: RAG-based legal case law search with Next.js and FastAPI

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:env: test -f backend/.env || cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && test -f frontend/.env.local || cp frontend/.env.local.example frontend/.env.local
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev: npm run services && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
